user_query: I'm organizing a cryptocurrency conference and would like to compare the historical currency conversion rates for USD to EUR and GBP from 2015-01-01 to 2021-12-31. Can you provide me with the data in JSON format? Additionally, fetch the ticker changes for Ethereum (ETH) to USD.

TaskList.description: Fetch historical currency conversion rates for USD to EUR from 2015-01-01 to 2021-12-31.
Fetch historical currency conversion rates for USD to GBP from 2015-01-01 to 2021-12-31.
Fetch ticker changes for Ethereum (ETH) to USD.
Compile the collected data into a single JSON format.
